column7: texas. natividad was born on march 12
column9: texas to alejandro and gertrudes leal. he was a mason and tile layer by trade. he was known as blackie. he enjoyed his ranch. natividad was preceded in death by his parents
column10: one sister and one brother. he is survived by his wife of 57 years
column21: san juana rios and maria de la luz rodriguez. visitation will be held from 3:00 p. m. to 9:00 p. m. on tuesday
column23: 2015 at corpus christi funeral home with a rosary to be recited at 7:00 p. m. a funeral mass will be celebrated at 10:00 a. m. on wednesday
column25: 2015 at st. anthony catholic church in robstown
